content:
Yes, many of the hosts and guests from Before The Game have gone on to continue their careers in sports-related projects. Here are a few examples:

- Ryan Fitzgerald has continued to work in radio and television, including hosting a sports show on the Nova Radio Network and appearing on the Network Ten show, The Living Room.

- Anthony Lehmann has become a prominent sports journalist and commentator, working with both Channel Ten and Cricket Victoria.

- Andrew Maher continues to work as a sports presenter and commentator for Channel Seven and the AFL.

- Dave Hughes, who was a regular guest on Before The Game, has continued his successful career as a comedian and television personality. He has also hosted various sports-related shows, including The Front Bar.

- Sam Pang, who was also a regular guest on Before The Game, has become a popular television and radio host. He has also worked on various sports-related shows, including hosting The Front Bar with Dave Hughes.

Overall, Before The Game provided a platform for many talented hosts and guests to showcase their skills and personality. While the show may have ended, its legacy continues through the ongoing successes of these individuals in the sports and entertainment industries.
